message:
This movie was so horrible that I am bummed I saw it. I think it is the laziest movie I have seen in a loooong time.

But, I'm trying to get something from the experience. So...

Who do you think was the MC in the movie?

I don't think there was one, fwiw. I think it was all OS, and not much of that...
Dang. I love Charlie Day, oh well...YANR
I'm telling you, it's DEBS. Don't even bother streaming.
